site.title: Aleksandr Ditkin — Portfolio
meta.description: Personal site of Aleksandr Ditkin: about, skills, projects, and contact.
hero.name: Aleksandr
hero.role: Data & Analytics with a focus on Power BI, Dashboards, and ML.
about.title: About me
about.text1: I build data-driven solutions with a strong focus on Power BI dashboards, DAX/Power Query, and clean data models. End-to-end: from robust ETL (Python, SQL) to metrics design and stakeholder-ready visuals.
about.text2: Lately I’ve been delivering operations dashboards (Power BI), modeling energy consumption of e-trucks, and building reliable data pipelines that make daily decisions faster.

skills.title: Skills
skills.bi.title: Power BI & Analytics
skills.bi.desc: DAX, Power Query (M), star schema, measures, role-level security, performance tuning.
skills.de.title: Data Engineering
skills.de.desc: ETL with Python & SQL, data validation, reproducible pipelines, orchestration basics.
skills.ml.title: Machine Learning
skills.ml.desc: Feature engineering, time-series segmentation, clustering & MLPs, evaluation.
skills.fe.title: Frontend
skills.fe.desc: Clean HTML/CSS/JS, interactive dashboards (Streamlit), UX details & accessibility.
projects.title: Selected Projects
projects.pbi.title: Operations Dashboards (Power BI)
projects.pbi.desc: End-to-end KPIs: order flow, SLAs, capacity & routing; DAX measures, row-level security, refresh.
projects.pbi.modal.title: Operations Dashboards — end-to-end KPIs
projects.pbi.modal.desc: From data model to DAX and RLS: star schema, Power Query transformations, business measures and SLA monitoring, Row-Level Security and refresh strategies, performance tuning and governance.
projects.pbi.modal.tech: Power BI, DAX, Power Query, SQL
projects.p2.title: Energy Model for e-Trucks
projects.p2.desc: Route-enriched consumption modeling with time-series features and domain metrics.
projects.p2.modal.title: Energy Model for e-Trucks — route-enriched consumption
projects.p2.modal.desc: Modeling energy use on real trips with domain features: ORS enrichment (surface and steepness), weather integration and weight interpolation, time-window segmentation, k-medoids, ML pipelines, validation, metrics.
projects.p4.title: Select Zip
projects.p4.desc: Interactive web app for visualizing and managing German postal code regions. Users can select ZIP areas on a map, create regions, and export them to JSON or Excel.
projects.p4.modal.title: Select Zip — region builder for German PLZ
projects.p4.modal.desc: To use the app, provide a GeoJSON file with the geocoordinates of German PLZ boundaries. Then you can create custom regions, add or remove PLZ areas (by single click or lasso selection), and finally export the result as Excel or JSON.
contact.title: Get in touch
contact.text: The quickest way is email. I’m open to collaboration, internships, and working-student roles.
contact.note: Note: This is a demo. For a real form, a small backend is needed.
